ygData.subject: Re: Equipped Items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Dave Ellis  To:  Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 4:56 PM Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Equipped Items
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Dave Ellis <everquest@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 4:56 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Equipped Items


> From: "Dave Ellis" <everquest@...>
>
> Greetings brothers. I am intersted in compiling a list of items that are
> useful to Necromancers. I am currently wielding a Runed Totem Staff and
the
> Dagger of Marnek. Above and beyond that, I'm not clear on what's
available.
> I have mostly cloth armor and some wolf-hide armor. Perhaps some others
> might suggest what is worth questing for. I am a lvl 17-18 Gnome
> necromancer. Please state the size if applicable. I don't believe there
are
> any robes that a trendsetting gnome can wear.


I believe woven or net (mesh?) armor is good. Same stats as leather mostly.
My Dark Elf is wearing woven right now. plus its magical. About 8 to 5 plat
per piece. Being 17th i'm sure you probably already know this but Since you
asked... :) What is the dagger of Marnek BTW?

-Mazooth
